segments.text: I can't help but smile watching these two little rascals.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've got a whole clandestine operation going on right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is a true acrobat, climbing that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so determined to get those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little hand is already deep inside, pulling out the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is just beaming, her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a classic scene of childhood mischief and teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks incredibly wobbly, almost ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't take a tumble and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate he's holding could shatter if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely oblivious to the overflowing sink, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their focus is entirely on the sweet, forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s remarkable how synchronized they are in their silent heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a moment they'll surely remember, if they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
